resources.string: Добавить ссылку (например: mailto:, file:, geo:, http:)
Add NON NFC tags (NFC tags = Just scan!)
Добавить текста в речь(Пример: Привет мир)
Shows advanced and database settings for fine tuning and troubleshooting
Most aggressive NFC catching mode. Try to catch them all.
Support Say time in AM PM

Дорогой пользователь,

спасибо за использование NFC ReTag и покупку платной версии!

Мы хотели бы попросить вас оставить отзыв, и оцените это приложение. 

Еще раз спасибо и получайте удовольствие!

Дорогой пользователь,

спасибо за использование NFC ReTag!
\Мы хотели бы попросить вас оставить отзыв, и оцените это приложение. 

Пожалуйста купите платную версию ;-)

Еще раз спасибо и получайте удовольствие!!

Bluetooth disabled. Bluetooth must be enabled to get the saved bluetooth devices.

Change the Homescreen activity to an other activity
Choose a template to add to the current tag and cycle

Congratulation! Special NFC ReTAG tag written! (adv. version tag)

And don´t forget to rewrite your special NFC ReTAG tags ;-)

Enable/ disables user dialog for rating the app
(BETA) Uses official android api (> GB), but even most stock alarm clocks, doesn´t support it. Works best with 3rd party alarm clocks.(BETA)
Enables edit mode while app in foreground (= disable automode). Tap tag for edit.
Logs fired tags and triggers in an app internal table.

Shows status and settings for the NFC ReTag Expert Plugin
Export DB to user accessible folder
HINT: Add optinal title for calendar entry. This activity opens a new calendar entry. You have to add additional information and save it manually.
HINT: Add web address (Например: www.google.com). Disable http:// pre-fix via settings.
Hint: Sometimes manual refresh of screen required.
You can catch your custom parameter via StringExtra RETAG_MYVAR. Broadcast action =
HINT: Do NOT add more than 1 TexttoSpeech activity per tag. Some strange things could happen! Only 1 TexttoSpeech activity per tag supported!
HINT: Please add navigation destination (Google maps compatible format-> e.g. 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway Mountain View, CA 94043) or leave blank to start navigation without destination.)
HINT: Please add secret code without prefix (*#*#) and suffix (#*#*)\n\ne.g. *#*#4636#*#* = 4636
HINT: Please add time in milliseconds (2500 = 2,5 seconds). Please be aware that this activity is, due to the internal handling in android, highly unreliable.
HINT: Set Alarm in X minutes. Android standard alarm doesn´t support seconds, so be aware that the alarm time is rounded to the minute!
"You could use your custom variable in Tasker via %yvr. "

HINT: Tasker fallback solution may be active (change via settings). Please add exact tasker task name manually within the parameter field, watch out for unnecessary blanks!\n\nStill doesn´t work? -> Enable Tasker (on/off button in Tasker UI), check Tasker settings (misc) \'allow external access\', install NFC ReTAG AFTER Tasker (-> re-install NFC ReTAG->don´t forget to backup DB).
Disables the \'http://\' prefix for internet addresse within the browse activity!
If you have issues with the tasker integration, please try the Tasker fallback solution via settings.
Import DB. Will delete your current database.
Importing a database delete all entries in your current database!
Overrides the system language within NFC ReTag (BETA)
Log empty. You can enable/ disable the log via settings.

Для некоторых активити понадобятся права суперпользователя и/или разрешения, связанные с безопасностью. Чтобы сохранить основные приложения безопасными, NFC ReTag предоставляет БЕСПЛАТНЫЙ \"Плагин Эксперт-режим для NFC Retag\". Пожалуйста, скачайте плагин с Google Playstore, если хотите запускаться как активити.
Это приглушает \'Обнаруженный тег\' всплывающие окна с информационной активити
"Имя или UID пусты! Пожалуйста, добавьте Тег имени или UID первыми!"
NFC отключен! Пожалуйста, для начала включите NFC модуль!
NFC ReTAG: БД восстановлена: столбец добавлен:
NFC ReTAG: БД восстановлена: таблицы созданы.
NFC ReTAG: Ошибка! Не найден файл для импорта.
NFC ReTAG: Ошибка при создании шаблона!
Плагин Эксперт-режим для NFC Retag установлен, НО SecSettings НЕдоступны!
NFC ReTAG: Простите! Нет активити, сохраненных на тег!
NFC ReTAG: Простите! Нет активити, сохраненных на тег или шаблон активити не найден!
Разрешения Tasker. NFC ReTag разрешения для запуска задач Tasker.
Разрешения плагина NFC ReTag. Это внутреннее разрешение NFC ReTag для связи с плагинами NFC ReTag.
Пожалуйста, выберите активити. Не все активити запускаются!
Пожалуйста, выберите сохраненную сеть Wi-Fi для подключения. (Включите Wi-Fi, если список пуст!)
Пожалуйста, выберите сеть Wi-Fi network для подключения
Плагин установлен, до сих пор не предоставлено Root-разрешений.

"Реклама поддерживает бесплатную (free) версию (с ограниченным числом тегов и триггеров) и есть безлимитная версия (PRO), которая свободна от рекламы. 

Пожалуйста, сначала проверьте работоспособность бесплатной версии, перед загрузкой PRO.

 "
"Заново использовать защищенные от записи теги - это более дешево, чем покупать новые. В таком случае, оплатите нам чашку кофе, скачав PRO версию ;-)"
Catch NFC ReTag Activity tags and Activity beam.
Подхватить специальные теги NFC ReTag (По умолчанию).
Подхватить теги НЕ от NFC ReTag (неуказанные/защищ.от записи/текст и тд.). (Оключите для решения проблем на некоторых Beam-девайсах.)
Обновить/Восстановить БД. Попробуйте обновить или восстановить базу данных. Ре-инициализируйте некоторые таблицы и значения (т.е. статистика тегов)
Вручную запросить права суперпользователя. Обычно это не обязательно.
Сбрасывает все NFC ReTag настройки, но оставляет базу данных. Вы можете сбросить базу данных через настройки базы данных.
Поддержка сообщений о потеряных метках с помощью Xposed NFCLockScreenOffEnabler модуля!
Коснитесь тега для записи специального NFC ReTAG тега …
Показывает, может ли плагин эксперт-режима запускать активити суперпользователя
Показывает настройки и опции устранения ошибок относящиеся к базе данных NFC ReTag
Коснитесь тега для записи smarttag для sony устройств …Для начала выберите цвет!
Простите, активити не поддерживается на Android < 4.0+
Простите, складывается впеачатление, что приложение третьих лиц, Tasker - не установлено!
Простите, но NFC адаптер не обраружен! NFC функции не работают! Но Вы можете использовать триггеры Wi-Fi и Батареи для игры с Произвольными тегами.
Простите, но валидный UID не обнаружен! Пожалуйста, добавьте валидный и уникальный UID перед симулированием тегов.
Простите, что-то случилось с вашей базой данных. Большая часть записей кончилась (max. 6 используя БЕСПЛАТНУЮ версию).Пожалуйста, почистите данные приложения (-> удалить тег базы данных)!

Простите, лимит тегов БЕСПЛАТНОЙ версии иссяк.

Лимит тегов: 4x NFC тега (вкл. Пользовательские) + 2 дополнительных триггера (такие как 1x Wi-Fi + 1x Батареи)

Пожалуйста, воспользуйтесь PRO версией, если вам необходимо использовать больше тегов и триггеров!

Простите, this feature needs android 4.0 ICS! There is a workaround for pre ICS devices, but it´s not as bulletproof as the ICS solution and it´s BETA status. Better try the Market tag option! This will delete all previous stored data on the tag!
Tag Lost, doesn´t fire when screen goes off in nfc screen off mode (NFC ON while locked AND screen ON)
Tap a tag to IMPORT activities from NFC ReTAG activity tag!
Tag is not formatable or already Ndef formated!
Tag is write protected, blocked or not formated! Nothing done! You can try to format the tag, if error persists!
Tag is write protected! Nothing done!
Tag is write protected or blocked! Nothing done!
Tap a tag to write activities to tag (optional)
Activate manual input for Tasker tasks. For cases when Tasker list disappears without saving the task!
Template activity not allowed within activity tag or beam (activity skipped!)
Sorry, you could not add template activities to templates due to possible circular references!

This free version has a tag limit.

Tag limit: 4x NFC tags (incl. Manual) + 2 additional triggers (e.g. 1x Wifi + 1x Battery)

OK, we let you add another NFC tag, but that´s it for the free version!

Go and get the PRO version if you need more tags and triggers!
This will delete all entries in the log.
This will delete all previous stored data on the tag!
This will format the tag. All data will be deleted!
This will import an activity tag as template!
This will override all previous stored data on the tag!
Configure timestamp title prefix (via Expert Plugin)
" Title AND UID are empty! Please add a title or an UID!"
" Title is empty! Please add a template title!"
To configure the wifi network, please use the standard wifi settings.
To configure the wifi network, please use the standard wifi settings.
NFC ReTAG PRO: This application is not licensed or can not connect to check the license. Check your connection, purchase it from Google Play or try the FREE version.
Wifi disabled. Wifi must be enabled to get the available networks.
Wifi list not accessible, please enable wifi first!
Write error! Nothing done. Please check, if tag has enough writeable memory. Try an other write option (fallback = smallest)!
Write error! Nothing done. Try again!
Tag forces device to open NFC ReTAG when this tag is detected!
You can only delete the LAST cycle (>1). Please navigate to the last cycle.

"NFC ReTAG

 ***NEW: Version 2.7 added Wifi and Battery triggers***
 ReUse/ReCyle write protected NFC tags such as hotel key-cards, access badges, price tags, skicards, key fobs etc. …
 You can use this app to associate multiple functions (e.g. enable Wlan, start navigation to ZXY, toggle Bluetooth, launch any installed app, call a phone number etc.) to a specific NFC Tag or trigger via an app internal database.
 This app does not write or change any NFC tags (except you want to write a special NFC ReTAG tag for better dispatching)!


Help, full changelog and support: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1477138


New Features:
 Update 2.8 (2.8.x = fixes) * NEW Bluetooth trigger * Set Cycle activity * Android 4.4 support * Android 4.4 Location activity * Bug fixes
Update 2.7 (2.7.x = fixes) * NEW Wifi and Battery triggers * NEW Activities: Close app, Toggle NFC Setting, Location Access, URI * Log table for activities * Improved receiver handling * And many additional improvements, tweaks and bugfixes
An ad supported free version (with limited number of tags and triggers) and an unlimited ad-free (PRO) version is available. Please check if this app works on your phone via the free version before downloading the pro version.

 Hint: Some security related NFC Tags (e.g. in passports) change their ID on every read attempt. This app will not work with such tags.

"

"Update 2.8 (2.8.x = fixes) * NEW Bluetooth trigger * Set Cycle activity * Android 4.4 support * Android 4.4 Location activity * Bug fixes
Update 2.7 (2.7.x = fixes) * NEW Wifi and Battery triggers * NEW Activities (plugin 1.3): Close app, Toggle NFC Setting, Location Access, URI * Log table for activities * Improved receiver handling * And many additional improvements, tweaks and bugfixes
Full Changelog: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1477138

Beam your tag cycle!

Since NFC ReTag version 2.2 you can beam your tag cycle to other android devices with NFC ReTag installed (android 4.x required!)

 "How to beam your tag cycle: - First enable android beam (-> settings) on both devices …
 - Be aware, that standard nfc will only work when device is not locked and screen is ON.
 - Open this NFC ReTag tag edit screen on the sending device and choose the tag cycle for beaming 
 - Tap the devices together with their "nfc sweet spot" … -> you should hear the nfc sound AND the screen view should shrink and a message "touch to beam" should appear.
 - Touch the shrunk screen view without losing the nfc connection and that´s it!… 

 Hint: Via NFC ReTag settings, you could enable/disable the beam receiver on the receiving device. For importing beamed tag cycles as template, you must open the "Import activity tag as template" screen on the receiving device."

Why writing tags?

With NFC ReTag you don´t have to write anything on your tag. Your activities are saved in an app-internal database on your device (-> Does NOT send ANY data to the net!). The app reads only the ID of the tag and triggers the linked activities. This concept has a lot of advantages, like the use of write protected tags, faster tag processing, an unlimited number of activities per tag (without size restrictions) and the possibility to use some cool features e.g. the tag cycles. 

Nevertheless, NFC ReTag allows you to write tags (of course, writeable tags required!): 

- Write special NFC ReTag tag (via more-Button): Better tag dispatching (only short info on the tag, no activities on the tag, RECOMMENDED!) 

- Write NFC ReTag activity tag (via Edit tag): Activities written on tag (number of activities depends on tag size, no cycles, database independent, works on every device with NFC ReTag installed, import of NFC ReTag activity tags available) 

- Write smarttag for sony devices (via more-Button): Write smarttags (Blue, Green etc.) 

- Format as NDEF tag (via more-Button): NDEF format option for NOT (pre-)formated tags 

Bottom line: With NFC ReTag you could combine the advantages of both concepts… 
So, why not? ;-) 

Hint:You could shrink the necessary tagsize, if you want to write an activity tag, created before the 2.1 update, by simply re-attaching the [Start app] activities! 


Have fun!

"Since NFC ReTag version 2.5 you could use placeholders within all text parameters to let your activities replace the placeholders at runtime.
 Available Placeholders:

[%UID]= UID 
[%RID]= ReTag ID 
[%CYC]= Current Cycle 
[%AID]= Android ID 
[%TIM]= Current Time (hour:minute) 
[%DAT]= Current Date (yyyy-mm-dd)


You could deactivate this function via settings. The ReTag ID is in most cases identical with the UID, but not always! Be aware that devices with Broadcom NFC chip (e.g. Nexus 4 and Nexus 10), doesn´t support mifare classic 1k tags, therefore the mifare UID could not be correctly parsed with those device and tag combinations. In this cases, and ONLY in this cases, you could try the [%UID_M] placeholder."

"Since NFC ReTag version 2.6 we added additional write options for Special NFC ReTag tags and Activity tags. The Android NFC dispatching system is complex and powerful, finding the right kind of write option is always a trade-off between required tag space, bulletproof dispatching and compatibility.

 Depending on your personal needs, your available tag space and your Android version (Version tags require Android 4.+), different concepts could be the right choice for you:

 * Advanced Version Tag: Best choice, if tag space doesn´t matter and you want to use it (e.g. sharing WiFi credentials with your friends) with the PRO and FREE version (Bulletproof dispatching, biggest tag space).

 * Market Tag: Best choice, if tag space matters and you want as much as compatibility (FREE/PRO) as possible (Strong tag dispatching, small tag space).

 * Version Tag: Best choice, if you want to use the tag only personally with the FREE OR PRO version. (Bulletproof dispatching, medium tag space).

 * Fallback Tag: Smallest Tag space, only recommended as fallback with very small tag space available (Weak dispatching, smallest tag space required).

"
